entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
